name: Chris Bowman’s Eggplant Parmagiana
instructions: Stack eggplant with salt in between every other to drain out bitterness for ½ hour
Rinse it with cool water, pat dry
Dip in egg wash and then in breadcrumbs with Italian seasoning
Fry till crispy in vegetable oil
Place a small amount of sauce in 9 x 13 pan
Layer eggplant, parmesan cheese, little sauce, repeat and repeat
Bake covered 35-40 minutes then add mozzarella
description: Breaded eggplant with marinara and cheese
